text: Ponzio is a surname. Notable people with this surname include: * Augusto Ponzio (born 1942), Italian semiologist and philosopher * Ben Ponzio (born 1975), American poker player * Facundo Ponzio (born 1995), Argentinian footballer * Flaminio Ponzio (1560–1613), Italian architect * Jean-Michel Ponzio (born 1967), French illustrator * Leonardo Ponzio (born 1982), Argentinian footballer * Melissa Ponzio (born 1972), American actress * Pietro Pontio (1532–1596), Italian composer
title: Ponzio
